HotelName: Hotel Convent Hotel & Resort Adria Ankaran
Description:
Offering a rich buffet breakfast and free Wi-Fi, Hotel Convent is part of the Adria Ankaran Resort, which has its own beach, an Olympic size swimming pool and an indoor pool with heated sea water. The hotel is housed in a former Benedictine monastery that was renovated in 2020.

You can play beach volleyball, table tennis, mini golf, football and basketball at the resort. There are tennis courts and various water sports available as well. A wellness centre with sauna and fitness area is available at a surcharge.

All rooms come with air conditioning, satellite TV and a minibar, while the private bathrooms include a hairdryer. They offer views of the park or atrium with a fountain built in 1835.

Half board is available at the Convent Restaurant, which serves Mediterranean specialities.

The Parenzana, a cycling route that runs along the Slovene coast, starts just out of Ankaran. Koper and the Italian border are a 10-minute drive away, while Trieste and Ronchi dei Legionari Airport can be reached in just 35 minutes by car. Description:

Description: The Holiday House Zotlar is located in a beautiful panoramic location, on the edge of Bohinj village. The sparkling Bohinj Lake is within easy reach. Several ski centres are easy to access, and cross country skiing tracks can be found right outside the front door. Cycling tracks are also found very close to the property. Toboggan runs sit behind the house. There are numerous other activities available throughout the year, and other places of interest in the locale include the Sava River and Aqua Park. There are restaurants, bars, shops, a petrol station, and bus and train station in the immediate vicinity. The house can accommodate between 4 and 12 people, making it ideal for families and groups of friends. There is an entrance hall, 5 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a kitchen, and a large living room. Amenities include a warming fireplace in the living room, cable TV, radio, and a washing machine. Cooking facilities include an oven, stove, microwave, dishwasher, and fridge freezer. Guests can enjoy relaxing on the lovely veranda and children can play in the garden. There are play areas close to hand. In the summer months there is outdoor furniture and visitors can try some al fresco cooking and dining. Car parking is available and there is wifi internet access in the house.
HotelFacilities: Hotel

Description: The three star Apartments Pod Rodico are 11 kilometres from the Vogel ski area, in the Julian Alps. The stunning lake is a convenient ten minute drive away, and there are great spa facilities literally a few minutes away from the apartments. Guests can enjoy the picturesque scenery as well as the ski slopes. There are four apartments in a charming chalet style building. Furnishings are in the traditional Alpine style. Two of the apartments can sleep between two and four people, and the other two apartments are aimed more towards families, and can sleep between four to five people. Each apartment has a fold out sofa bed in the living room, and kitchenette facilities, and benefits from its own personal entrance. Apartments have either a balcony or a terrace. Staff can speak a range of languages, including Slovenian, English, German, Italian, Russian and Czech. Guests can enjoy the pretty garden at any time, and there is a BBQ on the terrace once a week. Children will have fun at the play area. There are storage facilities for sports equipment. Staff can arrange guided tours for you to really make the most of your stay in this pretty part of Slovenia. Internet is available for an additional fee. Car parking is available, and there is a pet friendly policy.
